column4: Hey guys, i am having a bit of trouble with an external harddrive i have. 1: files are totally transfering to it when i transfer through ubuntu and 2: vista is saying that the folder(in which i have transfered files into) is corrupt or inacessible. any ideas?
how do you have the external formatted?
if its fat32, try checking using gparted, if its NTFS, do a checkdsk on it from Vista
